Description:
OPEN HOUSE: Friday, October 7th from 12pm - 5pm & Saturday, October 8th from 10am - 3pm.

Broadstreet’s Lakeview Ridge offers 1, 2, and 3 bedroom pet friendly apartments for rent in West Kelowna. Inside your spacious, open-concept apartment you’ll feel at home with in-suite laundry, large walk-in closets, and an exterior patio space to enjoy outdoor living. At Lakeview Ridge you can bring your four-legged friends to the on-site dog run, then enjoy a bath in the dog wash. Sustainable living is realized at Lakeview Ridge with electric vehicle charging stations on site and Broadstreet’s convenient community gardens, bringing the farm-to-table experience right to your home. This community is ready for you to call home.

This modern rental apartment community is located in Westbank along the Okanagan Hwy. You will find amenities such as grocery stores, shopping, and restaurants for your daily needs. Nearby, you can enjoy Johnson Bentley Aquatic Centre, Landmark Cinemas, and Westbank Museum for entertainment. At Lakeview Ridge you can be at home while conveniently close to the best amenities West Kelowna has to offer with mountain biking to water skiing, and winery tours to boutique shopping.

Contact us today!




Shopping – Wal-Mart | Superstore | Home Depot

Parks – Eleanor Reece Memorial Park

Description:
This brand new, beautiful three-storey townhouse with nearly 1,400 square feet of living space house is at walking distance to UBC Okanagan and 15 minutes driving to downtown Kelowna. A great place to live, work, and study.

The townhouse has 3 bedrooms with large windows and 2.5 bathrooms. The first floor has a spacious two-car tandem garage. The second floor has a huge living room, a dining room, a half bath, and an open-concept kitchen with custom-made cabinets, quartz counter tops, and stainless steel appliances. Luxury vinyl plank floor throughout the entire second floor. A balcony is perfect for you to enjoy a tea time or read a book. The third floor has a large master bedroom with an ensuite full bath, two bedrooms, another full bath, and stacked washer and dryer.

No smoking, no pets

Please contact me if interested.

Thanks!

Situated in bustling West Kelowna, Lakeview Pointe is a brand new building with a strong sense of community and full suite of amenities, providing the perfect location for your next home:

Small to medium-sized pets are welcome and will enjoy sunbathing in the living room
Enjoy the spacious fitness centre equipped with treadmills, exercise bikes, ellipticals, full home gym, and free weights to help you meet your fitness goals
Relax in the steam room after a hard workout or long day
Spend some time getting to know your neighbors or hanging out with your friends in the community lounge and games room which includes both billiard and foosball tables
Grab some popcorn and watch a movie (or your favorite team play) with full surround sound and comfortable leather chairs in the theatre room
With a Starbucks coffee station in the main lobby, you won't have to leave your building to get your favorite drink
Collaborate or find a quiet place to work in the business centre boasting natural light with large windows
Underground parking equipped with electric vehicle charging stations provide convenience for our environmentally conscious residents
Keyless entry and on-site management help to keep the buildings secure and safe for residents

Description:
Pacific Cove Property Management Ltd. 

Overlooking the picturesque Penticton Creek to the north, Forestbrook Manor is located on quiet Forestbrook Drive in the heart of beautiful Penticton BC, walking distance from all the necessary amenities on nearby Government Street including Marketplace IGA. Forestbrook also sits on the Number 2 bus route, and is a direct 10-minute bus ride or 25-minute walk from Penticton's quaint and historic downtown and the beautiful beaches of Okanagan Lake.

Forestbrook Manor features one- and two-bedroom suites with well-equipped kitchens, spacious in-suite storage, and large balconies. For the comfort of all residents, Forestbrook Manor is a smoke-free and pet-free building.

If you are interested in a suite that is currently unavailable, please reach out and contact us, and we will add you to our waitlist!

Description:
Broadstreet's Valley Views offers 1, 2, and 3 bedroom pet friendly apartments for rent with picturesque orchard and mountain views. This modern rental apartment community sits in the heart of the adventurous waterfront city of Penticton-between the stunning blue waters of Okanagan Lake and Skaha Lake.

Valley Views is centrally located and only minutes away from Cherry Lane Shopping Centre, lush parks, excellent schools, golf courses, and the downtown core. Inside your spacious, open-concept apartment, you'll feel at home with in-suite laundry, large walk-in closets, and built-in air conditioning to keep you cool during hot summer months. With nearby world-class mountain biking, water sports galore, and a plethora of wineries-Valley Views offers the best location to explore in Penticton. Living at Valley Views means enjoying all the friendliness of a small community and some of the best apartment-style living in the city.

Contact us today!




Shopping – Cherry Lane Shopping | Superstore | Save-On Foods

Parks – Skaha Lake Park

Schools – Parkway Elementary | Sprott Shaw College

Description:
Broadstreet's Ridgecrest Place offers 1, 2, and 3 bedroom pet friendly apartments for rent in the budding community of Penticton. This modern rental apartment community boasts beautiful mountain views to the west, and sits just one block from Penticton Plaza and the local YMCA. It is centrally located and only minutes away from Skaha Lake, Okanagan Lake, and the Penticton Regional Airport. Students attending Okanagan College can make it home to Ridgecrest Place in less than 5 minutes via Duncan Ave and commuters have quick access to Highway 97.

Inside your spacious, open-concept apartment you'll feel at home with in-suite laundry and large walk-in closets. You can also experience peace of mind with flexible rental agreements and exclusive perks like covered parking! At Ridgecrest Place, you can bring your four-legged friends to the on-site dog run, or simply take them to enjoy the trails and scenery of nearby Munson Mountain Park. An extension of the Kettle Valley Trail runs parallel to the property, providing convenient walking and cycling connections to other parts of the region. Living at Ridgecrest means enjoying all the friendliness of a small community and some of the best apartment living in Penticton.

Contact us today!




Shopping – Whole Foods | Safeway | IGA

Parks – Munson Mountain Park | Kettle Valley Trail

Schools – Holy Cross Elementary School | Carmi Elementary

Description:
Feel good, live well at our Skaha Shores rental community in Penticton. Be a part of a larger movement to reduce our environmental impact by joining our net-zero energy ready community.

Only 100 meters from the beach and down the road from Skaha Bluffs, you can live your best life, stress-free. Enjoy meeting your neighbours on the rooftop patio, get some fresh air in the Community Garden, and feel healthy in our fitness centre.

We're only a call away, so join us today! 

SKAHA SHORES HIGHLIGHTS

• Net-zero energy ready community (it's good for the planet)

• BUILT GREEN®, rooftop solar array, and electric car charging stations.

• Smoke-free community with on-site staff.

• Pet-friendly homes, complete with a fenced dog run. Maximum 22 inches shoulder height, some breed restrictions apply. Please inquire for details. 

• Individual in-suite heat and A/C controls for optimal comfort. 

• BBQ year-round with a covered deck.

• In-suite laundry and open-concept kitchens.

• Book the community lounge, with kitchenette, for larger get-togethers.

• Exercise in our complimentary fitness room.

• Grow fruits and veggies in our robust community garden.

THE PERKS

• Complimentary fitness room.

• Telus incentives.

CONTACT US

P. 778-860-5211
Email us @ Skaha Shores
Visit us Skaha Shores Website
A: 3650 South Main Street, Penticton, BC, V2A 5J8

Please visit our website for more information, to book a viewing, and apply online.

A Community Designed, Developed, and Operated by Highstreet Ventures

Description:
Coming available February 2023!




*Please note that advertised prices are the starting prices of each unit type. Prices will vary depending on unit style and location within the building*

The Perennial, located at 3352 Hemlock Street, Penticton is embedded within one of two cities in the world situated between two lakes - Okanagan and Skaha lake. These lakes feature nearly 15 acres of sandy beach and numerous swimming areas. Beaches and water fun are embedded within the cities culture, so why not live within a 13 minute walk to Skaha Lake and Skaha Lake Park?

Understanding summer doesn't last all year, The Perennial is situated 40 minutes away from Apex Mountain Resort and 50 minutes from the Nickel Plate Nordic Centre. Tenants will also be able to access The Perennial gym all throughout the year.

Two elevators, a bike wash, bike storage, visitor parking, a bocce ball court, dog wash, community garden beds, and an outdoor kids play area will also be available to all tenants within The Perennial. 

There are over 80 wineries in the Penticton metropolitan area, 7 craft breweries, 2 cideries and 3 distilleries all within easy walking or biking distance of the downtown core. Our development at 3352 Hemlock Street will offer 166 stylish, modern units, with the upper floors offering a view of Skaha Lake. Located in a quiet neighborhood and within walking distance to parks, beaches, shopping, and schools, The Perennial has all the amenities one needs to call this home.




*Pictures and virtual tours are an accurate representation, but not exact*

Situated along Mount Benson Street, The Parklane is located in a quiet neighbourhood - just a quick walk or drive from daily amenities including transit, coffee shops, local restaurants, and the Harbourfront Walkway. An array of parks are nearby, including Bowen Park and Maffeo Sutton Park..

Residents of The Parklane enjoy spacious living areas with large balconies on upper floors, some that capture beautiful water views. Rent at The Parklane includes hot water, access to the building's laundry facilities, sauna, bike storage and our games room equipped with table tennis and air hockey. Parking is available.

Description:
Royal Arms is located just east of downtown Victoria at the corner of Yates and Harrison in the charming urban village of Fernwood. Just a 15-minute walk from downtown Victoria, with its offices, shops and restaurants, and the beautiful inner Victoria harbour, the building's hillside location offers many suites a scenic view of the beautiful city and beyond. 

Closer at hand is "funky Fernwood", the charming neighbourhood surrounding Royal Arms, with its restaurants featuring a diverse offering of ethnic cuisine, coffee shops, and independent stores like Wellburn's Market and Aaronson's pharmacies. A transit stop offering direct and quick access to downtown Victoria, the University of Victoria, and Royal Jubilee Hospital, is just steps away, and within 5 blocks you'll find both Victoria High School and George Jay Elementary. 

We offer completely renovated, large and bright one- and two-bedroom suites with stainless steel appliances including dishwashers, large living rooms and balconies, and ample storage. We have plenty of parking, on-site laundry, and extra storage. Our on-site caretaker is always available to ensure our residents' needs are well looked after.

Description:
Conveniently located in beautiful Westhills. This welcoming 3 bedroom 2.5 bath duplex is situated on low a maintenance lot with fully fenced private backyard.

The open concept main floor features an abundance of natural light, a well designed kitchen boasting ample cabinetry, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and breakfast bar. The dining area has a large picture window and the living room is complemented by a gas fireplace, over height ceilings, and sliding doors leading to an intimate patio and level backyard. A single car attached garage, large crawlspace for storage and 2-piece powder room complete the main floor.

Upstairs has 3 bedrooms (including a king sized principal bedroom with 4-piece ensuite and large walk in closet!) a family bathroom and laundry room.

Close proximity to all level of schools, recreation, shopping, and amenities.
- One small pet considered on a case by case basis.
- NO SMOKING.
- Utilities not included.
- Available November 15th 
- Central Heating/AC

Yello on Yates is a collection of stylish rental suites in the heart of downtown Victoria providing the opportunity to live with access to the city's best. This is an address you'll be proud to call home near downtowns Harris Green neighbourhood. Our 1 and 2 bedroom suites feature modern stainless steel appliances, in-suite laundry, quartz countertops, luxury vinyl plank flooring, and LED lighting. The property is 100% smoke free, has underground parking available and water in included in your rent!


Yello on Yates is surrounded by the best of downtown Victoria, located nearby the B.C. Legislature, only minutes away from the Atrium commercial building, and a close walk to Harbour Air Terminal. A number of schools, daycares, medical clinics and grocery stores are all nearby. Restaurants and entertainment venues such as Cactus Club Café, The Keg, Cineplex Cinema, YMCA, Market on Yates, and Tim Hortons are within walking distance. You'll find an excellent selection of amenities near your doorstep such as public transit, attractions including Five Star Whale Watching and The Royal BC Museum; just one block away. In addition, the newly renovated Capitol Theatre is a must-see and right next door to Yello on Yates's residents.

Features:

100% smoke free property
Open concept, one and two bedroom suites
6 appliances including in-suite laundry

Description:
Beautifully renovated home in Tanner Ridge! This Executive / Family home features 3 beds + Office/den, 2baths, a large well-designed kitchen and living space, and 2 decks perfect for entertaining.

The home has been completely renovated inside and out with new luxury vinyl flooring, new stainless steel appliances, cabinets, quartz countertops, pantry & sinks, new bathrooms, baseboards, electric fireplace, windows, and Hardie board siding. The home features a spacious primary suite with a new 3 piece ensuite bath & 2 closets. Two additional bedrooms, a new 4 piece main bath & a bright office/den opening onto a rear deck and front deck.

Situated on a beautifully landscaped 0.25-acre lot with 2 apple trees, a cherry tree, and a large driveway for ample parking.


* No smoking
* Pets considered on a case by case basis

* Tenant is responsible for 80% of the BC Hydro and 100% of Internet
* Shared yard
* Driveway parking
* 1 year initial lease term

Please note: There is a separate, soundproofed, self-contained suite in the lower part of the home.




Tanner Ridge is a quiet and peaceful hilltop community with views of the Haro Strait, San Juan Islands, and Mount Baker. It has 2 great parks a 2 min walk from the house. The home is within walking distance to farms with fresh local produce, transit, 5mins to wineries & beaches, 10mins to Butchart Gardens, 20mins to downtown Victoria Inner Harbor, 10 mins to Sidney by the Sea & a short drive to the Airport & Ferries.

Description:
This fully furnished & ready-to-move-in executive suite is all you need to enjoy a comfortable time in Victoria!

The executive suite is ready to move in starting Sept. 01 and is available on a fixed tenure of up to six months rental.

With a modern contemporary design, this suite is within walking distance to all major parts of downtown, and is in the center of all you need throughout your stay; whether it be a grocery store, gym, or the best coffee shops, and restaurants, you name it!

The 342 sq. ft. executive suite has amazing features including heated bathroom floors, hot and cold heat pump, 43” Smart TV with Pik TV, air purifier, Keurig coffee machine, holds premium built-in appliances from brands such as Bosch, Fisher & Baker, Liebherr, and much more! A working desk is set up to provide a focused environment for any work or studying required.

Residents will also have access to their 115 sq. ft private patio and a rooftop with additional amenities including commercial grade BBQ, a shareable community vegetable garden, and stellar panoramic views. The condo comes fully furnished with all linens, towels, and cutlery as a package deal with all utilities included. Guests will also have access to an indoor private bike rack.

There is no parking with this unit but the option of monthly parking is available for an additional cost (subject to availability).

The Space:

Newly built in 2020, our Yates on Yates apartment is modern and contemporary with an inviting space to relax during your time in Victoria. This bright studio suite can sleep up to 2 guests (2 adults) with 1 double bed in the bedroom/living room.

About Us:

Mairet Rentals is a bespoke rental management company located in Victoria. We oversee numerous residences throughout Victoria downtown and take pride in providing a hospitable, smooth, and seamless experience to our residents.

Throughout your stay, you'll have access to our 24x7 representatives available to answer any major queries, a housekeeping team with established credentials within the hospitality industry, a responsive maintenance team, etc.

Policies:

Please note: Guests are required to have a mandatory clean ($50 each clean) once every 14 days at the expense of the guest. An optional cleaning can be requested every 7 days at the expense of the guest.

There is a strict no-pet policy for this suite. No exceptions.

Zero tolerance for noise and parties – the building is shared so please respect our neighbors and other tenants. Noise complaints will result in a penalty of $300. A total of 3 noise complaints will result in immediate eviction with no refund provided (including the deposit).

No parties, no smoking, no vaping, no drugs. Evidence of the activity would result in a penalty of $250.

The lost fob will be subject to a $70 replacement fee. The lost key will be subject to a $70 replacement fee.

Description:
This spacious home offers everything you need from summer through to winter, situated on Lake Okanagan and just 35 minutes away from SilverStar Mountain Resort. The property is on a .35 acre lot and has over 100 ft of lakeshore access including a well maintained private dock with two boat lifts. The beautifully landscaped ground level includes a large outdoor lounging area, hot tub, and basketball court as well as plenty of green space to take full advantage of the summer months. There is also an upper deck with a barbeque and a dining area, and a second level deck off the bedrooms to allow you to take in the views. This home is perfect for both your family and visitors with four upstairs bedrooms all with full ensuite bathrooms, and a main floor flex space which can be used as an office and additional bedroom.

The main floor has a well-appointed kitchen complete with lake views, abundant wood cabinetry, granite counter tops, stainless-steel appliances. There are two dining areas, a U-shaped wet bar with seating for hosting, and a large living room with a gas fireplace, perfect for relaxing or watching TV. The lower level brings more lounging space and an additional full bathroom. There is also a sizeable laundry room with a washer and dryer, large sink, and ample space to hang clothing. Both the main and lower floor of the home include low maintenance and durable tile flooring to allow for the indoor/outdoor lifestyle. The home is complete with air conditioning and wired in with a full alarm system. There is ample storage space with both a front garage and a lakefront garage equipped with a treadmill for an indoor/outdoor gym space and plenty of room for lake toys.

This home is perfect to take in everything the Okanagan has to offer and is just minutes to town.

Valley Views is centrally located and only minutes away from Cherry Lane Shopping Centre, lush parks, excellent schools, golf courses, and the downtown core. Inside your spacious, open-concept apartment, you'll feel at home with in-suite laundry, large walk-in closets, and built-in air conditioning to keep you cool during hot summer months. Description:
Coming available February 2023!




*Please note that advertised prices are the starting prices of each unit type. Prices will vary depending on unit style and location within the building*

The Perennial, located at 3352 Hemlock Street, Penticton is embedded within one of two cities in the world situated between two lakes - Okanagan and Skaha lake. These lakes feature nearly 15 acres of sandy beach and numerous swimming areas. Beaches and water fun are embedded within the cities culture, so why not live within a 13 minute walk to Skaha Lake and Skaha Lake Park?

Understanding summer doesn't last all year, The Perennial is situated 40 minutes away from Apex Mountain Resort and 50 minutes from the Nickel Plate Nordic Centre. Tenants will also be able to access The Perennial gym all throughout the year.

Two elevators, a bike wash, bike storage, visitor parking, a bocce ball court, dog wash, community garden beds, and an outdoor kids play area will also be available to all tenants within The Perennial. 

There are over 80 wineries in the Penticton metropolitan area, 7 craft breweries, 2 cideries and 3 distilleries all within easy walking or biking distance of the downtown core. Our development at 3352 Hemlock Street will offer 166 stylish, modern units, with the upper floors offering a view of Skaha Lake. Located in a quiet neighborhood and within walking distance to parks, beaches, shopping, and schools, The Perennial has all the amenities one needs to call this home.

Property Description

Enjoy the best of the beautiful BC interior by coming home to sweeping views of the Thompson River Valley in your air-conditioned abode. Relax on your balcony with a cup of coffee or tea as the sunrise cuts through the mist. When you're looking for a new rental apartment in North Shore Kamloops, Mainstreet's Tranquille Apartments are the right place to call home. Affordable, pet-friendly, newly-renovated, and smoke-free, these boutique suites come internet-ready and cable-ready to prevent any delays in getting connected. Suites have high-grain laminate floors, onsite laundry for your convenience, and secured building entry and keyless unit entry for your safety. We'll make moving easier by including your fridge, stove, and window coverings; and we even pay your water bills to push the savings further. This is a low-density building, which means a better quality of life with more space to yourself, fewer neighbours, and less noise and your first parking stall is free. We rarely have vacancy in this popular building, so apply online now!

Crown Isle Boulevard is great location to enjoy the beautiful Comox Valley. This 56-apartment complex in East Courtenay offers beautiful contemporary living spaces and amazing proximity to a wide range of amenities. Everything you need is close at hand! 

All the apartments come with stainless steel appliances and an apartment-size stackable washer/dryer. Wide plank laminate flooring throughout, with luxury-grade vinyl tiles in the bathroom. Enjoy the balcony to sit out and take in the views. Many of the apartments offer views of the Beaufort mountain range or partial ocean views for a truly inspirational place to call home.

These apartments all have A/C units for the hot days. With all amenities within walking distance, this area is ideal for people that love to walk, as well as trails that run down along Crown Isle Blvd.

Description: Your dream home awaits. Located in the desirable and quiet seabank/seal bay neighbourhood. Stocked with everything you could need, just bring your suitcases! In home office space as well with fast internet if you work from home. Listen to the seals bark with your morning coffee. Watch the eagles fly overhead while taking in the ocean air. Comes fully furnished with everything you'd need; from beach towels, high end furnishings, a fully stocked kitchen, and a cozy fireplace. 2 minute walk to a beach perfect for long walks and skipping rocks. Just down the road from the incredible Seal Bay Nature Park.

Description: Welcome home to The Shores. This beautiful, bright, modern building is within walking distance to downtown Courtenay, with all the shopping, restaurants, and amenities. Walk out the front door and onto the Riverway Heritage Walking Path. Our spacious one-one+den-two bedroom suites have in-suite washers/dryers, white quartz countertops in the kitchen and bathroom, high gloss white cabinetry, wide plank laminate flooring, and luxury vinyl in the bathroom. All apartments have air conditioning and balconies to enjoy. This building has keyless entry and security surveillance throughout the building and property.

Description:
NEXT PHASE NOW RENTING!

Broadstreet's Crestview at Seymour Village offers 1, 2, and 3 bedroom pet friendly apartments for rent in the conveniently located Merecroft area of Campbell River. This rental property sits in a quiet, family-friendly community in walking distance to local amenities that offer something for everyone. It is in a central location nearby Strathcona Gardens Recreation Facility, as well as Merecroft Village, which offers a grocery store and a number of excellent local restaurants. Students will find Timberline High School and North Island College just a few minutes down the road.

The desirable location and fantastic community features make this property a wonderful place to call home. Inside your spacious, uniquely designed apartment, you'll feel at home with in-suite laundry, large closets, and built-in air conditioning. You can cater to your four-legged friends at the dog run, or venture to the nearby Beaver Lodge trails. The on-site community garden means you can bring the farm-to-table experience right to your home. At Crestview, you can take part in some of the best apartment-style living in Campbell River, in a peaceful, accessible location.

Join the Waitlist today!




Shopping – Merecroft Village

Parks – Beaver Lodge Forest Lands | Robron Park

Schools – Carihi Secondary School | Timberline High School | North Island College

Public Transportation Access
More Info1: Please contact the Landlord to confirm availability

Description:
MOVE IN NOW!

Broadstreet's Crestview Tower at Seymour Village offers 2-bedroom pet-friendly apartments for rent in the centrally located Merecroft area of Campbell River. Perched on the highest point in the city, Crestview Tower awards panoramic views from every suite. The tallest building in the north island, this stunning first-of-its-kind 12-storey concrete building features 80 units in 10 storeys of residential and two levels of covered parking.

This property adds to Broadstreet's existing Crestview Apartments and Crestview Townhomes, creating a quiet, family-friendly rental community within a few minutes walking distance to Merecroft Village, Strathcona Gardens Recreation Complex, and Robron Park just outside your front door. Onsite, you'll also have access to a Community Lounge and BBQ area, Community Gardens, fitness centre, bike wash station, dog run and wash, and much more.

Enjoy your morning overlooking the Pacific Ocean or venture out for an afternoon in the nearby Beaver Lodge Lands trails. With on-site management, on-site maintenance, and a 24/7 Client Services team dedicated to your comfort and convenience, Crestview Tower in Campbell River is modern apartment living at its finest.

Experience Vancouver Island living with Broadstreet. Contact us today to inquire about Crestview Tower.




Shopping – Merecroft Village

Parks – Beaver Lodge Forest Lands | Robron Park

Schools – Carihi Secondary School | Timberline High School | North Island College

Public Transportation Access

Description:
Broadstreet's Crestview Townhomes at Seymour Village features 3-bedroom pet friendly rental homes, conveniently located in the Merecroft area of Campbell River.

This development sits in a quiet, family-friendly community within walking distance of local amenities that offer something for everyone. Nearby Strathcona Gardens features a pool, gym, and ice rinks. Robron Park includes a baseball diamond, soccer field, and lacrosse box. And the adjacent plaza includes a movie theatre, restaurants, grocery shopping at Quality Foods, a bicycle shop, and more!

Each townhome includes in-suite laundry, large closets, and built-in air conditioning. An on-site dog run provides a convenient off-leash outdoor area for four-legged family members. Additionally, on-site management and maintenance as well as Broadstreet's 24/7 Client Support team are there when you need them.

Rent with Broadstreet Properties and experience the best modern rental community living in Campbell River.





Shopping – Merecroft Village

Parks – Beaver Lodge Forest Lands | Robron Park

Public Transportation Access

Description:
$2,500 / 2br - 1 bath，main floor with own laundry， kitchen & living rooms (Campbell river)
Main floor of a house,fully furnished with eating area, living room, big deck open to kitchen area and living room with ocean/mountain views, laundry in unit, 2 good size bedrooms. free parking.
Conveniently located in Mariner Dr, Campbell River, quiet community. Asking $2500 per month plus 60% of utilities and $60 internet. Shot term from October15th, 2022 to April 30th, 2023.
Only good, neat, quiet, respectful, good credit tenant please.
No Pet, No smoking inside , no Drugs.
Downstairs is another tenant with his own separate entrance.
Please message to make appointment to view.
More Info1: Please contact the Landlord to confirm availability

Description:
In the heart of Downtown Campbell River, Tyee Apartment's waterfront location offers panoramic views of Discovery Passage and Quadra Island.




This new building is within walking distance to the ocean, several shops and restaurants at Tyee Plaza, the Visitor Centre, Vancouver Island Regional Library, theatre, the BC Ferries Quadra Island terminal and major banks.





Known as the Salmon Capital of the World, this growing coastal community on the east coast of the Island offers several amenities (airport, harbour, ferry) and is becoming a popular destination for young families and retirees.
More Info1: Please contact the Landlord to confirm availability

Description:
Considering a move to Vancouver Island? Want to try a tranquil, beach front paradise? Kick back and enjoy this little piece of heaven ! Walk on waterfront. Water views. Beautiful, quiet location. Wander through unspoilt rain forest, beachcomb or swim just outside your door. Spacious, very attractive and bright 1 bedroom, fireplace, sitting area, kitchenette.Fully furnished with king bed, and sofa bed. Newly redecorated. Beachy theme. Studio opens onto a patio. Bathroom nicely designed - large tub, shower, heated floor tiles. Condo well maintained. Free parking. Utilities & WiFi/cable included. Just move in - nothing could be easier.

Contact owner for length of lease 403 8636593.

No smoking or vaping, no loud parties, pets negotiable for a fee.

Available OCTOBER 2, 2022. 1-6 mos lease.
More Info1: Please contact the Landlord to confirm availability

Description:
Promotions
Call to learn more about the perks of the Early Bird Advantage!

The brand-new bachelor, one, and two-bedroom suites at Merewood Apartments feature a modern open-concept design with an incredible range of floor plans to choose from. The suites feature stainless steel appliances, in-suite laundry, individual climate-control, and large bright windows to maximize the view and available natural light. 

Tenants have access to lots of on-site amenities such as a gym, fireside social lounge with TV, kitchen, and dining area.

Description:
Apartments for rent in Parksville, BC! Gateway Apartments offers 1, 2, and 3-bedroom, pet friendly rentals. Inside your spacious, open concept suite, you'll feel right at home with in-suite laundry and large walk-in closets. Gateway Apartments feature community amenities such as electrical vehicle charging stations, a community garden, dog run, and dog wash. On-site management and maintenance, as well as 24/7 Client Support are available for your convenience.

Gateway Apartments is conveniently located a short drive from downtown Parksville, including Paradise Mini Golf and Fun Park, Mt. Arrowsmith Brewing Company, and the location of the popular Parksville Sandcastle Sculpture Competition. Quick access to Highway 19 and access to beautiful outdoor spaces, like the Springwood Park Sports Field, are also features sure to attract commuters and nature enthusiasts alike. Live at Gateway Apartments for the best rental living in Parksville, BC!




Shopping - Town Clock Plaza, Park Plaza

Parks - Parksville Community Park, Parksville Wetlands Trail

Public Transportation Access
